LanguageData.VWE_Longbow.label: longbow
LanguageData.VWE_Longbow.description: Craft longbows, a neolithic equivalent to the sniper rifle.
LanguageData.VWE_Longbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->refined the craft of longbow making, maximizing range and accuracy
LanguageData.VWE_Longbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->redefined warfare with the introduction of the sniper's bow
LanguageData.VWE_Longbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->inspired legends through feats of marksmanship that turned the tide of battles
LanguageData.VWE_Longbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.4: subject_story->developed techniques that allowed rapid, precise shots over great distances
LanguageData.VWE_Longbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.5: subject_gerund->enhancing long-range engagements with traditional craftsmanship
LanguageData.VWE_Crossbow.label: crossbow
LanguageData.VWE_Crossbow.description: Construct crossbows, a medieval ranged weapon effective against armored enemies.
LanguageData.VWE_Crossbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->merged the precision of archery with the power of mechanics
LanguageData.VWE_Crossbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->developed crossbows that pierce the defenses of the armored
LanguageData.VWE_Crossbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->innovated locking mechanisms for quicker reloads under pressure
LanguageData.VWE_Crossbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.4: subject_story->integrated advanced sighting systems to improve accuracy
LanguageData.VWE_Crossbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.5: subject_gerund->advancing siege warfare with innovation in armament
LanguageData.VWE_CompoundBow.label: compound bow
LanguageData.VWE_CompoundBow.description: Construct compound bows, which use industrial-era components to silently fire arrows with greater efficiency.
LanguageData.VWE_CompoundBow.generalRules.rulesString: subject_story->integrated modern technology to craft silent, deadly weapons
subject_story->pushed the boundaries of archery into the industrial era
subject_story->employed advanced materials for unmatched bow strength and flexibility
subject_story->optimized designs for ergonomic use and increased firing rates
subject_gerund->refining the art of stealth and precision in hunting and warfare
LanguageData.VWE_Gunpowder.label: gunpowder
LanguageData.VWE_Gunpowder.description: Synthesize gunpowder, the earliest known chemical explosive.
subject_story->unleashed the potential of chemical reactions for explosive results
subject_story->transformed warfare and mining with the discovery of gunpowder
subject_story->revolutionized siege tactics with the introduction of cannons
subject_story->facilitated the creation of small arms, changing personal defense and hunting
subject_gerund->pioneering the era of explosives and ballistic weaponry
LanguageData.VWE_TrenchWarfare.label: trench warfare
LanguageData.VWE_TrenchWarfare.description: Adapt a trench warfare doctrine with a selection of weapons for close-quarters combat.
LanguageData.VWE_TrenchWarfare.generalRules.rulesStri: subject_story->adopted age-old strategies to modern combat, ensuring survival
subject_story->innovated in close-quarters battle tactics within the trenches
subject_story->engineered fortifications that blend with the landscape for surprise attacks
subject_story->developed communication lines within trenches to coordinate assaults
subject_gerund->fortifying positions with strategic ingenuity in warfare
LanguageData.VWE_HeavyWeapons.label: heavy weapons
LanguageData.VWE_HeavyWeapons.description: Construct heavy weapons that offer superior firepower, at the cost of being very physically demanding.
LanguageData.VWE_HeavyWeapons.generalRules.rulesStrin: subject_story->developed weapons that bring unparalleled firepower to the battlefield
subject_story->balanced the scales of warfare with heavy, decisive armaments
subject_story->created training programs for specialized units to operate these weapons
subject_story->engineered mobility solutions to transport and deploy heavy armaments
subject_gerund->mastering the art of destruction with heavy weapons
LanguageData.VWE_Flamethrower.label: flamethrower
LanguageData.VWE_Flamethrower.description: Construct flamethrowers, weapons that project a long, controllable stream of fire. Their lethality has lead to bans on many civilized worlds.
LanguageData.VWE_Flamethrower.generalRules.rulesStrin: subject_story->harnessed fire in warfare to cleanse and conquer
subject_story->introduced a weapon feared for its psychological and physical impact
subject_story->innovated with fuel mixtures for longer range and burn times
subject_story->developed safety mechanisms to protect the operator from backlash
subject_gerund->spreading the flames of innovation and terror on the battlefield
LanguageData.VWE_SpecializedFirearms.label: specialized firearms
LanguageData.VWE_SpecializedFirearms.description: Craft specialized guns for demanding combat scenarios.
LanguageData.VWE_SpecializedFirearms.generalRules.rul: subject_story->crafted firearms designed for specific, challenging combat scenarios
subject_story->elevated the standards of gunsmithing to meet niche demands
subject_story->integrated cutting-edge optics for enhanced targeting accuracy
subject_story->customized weapons to suit individual user preferences and tactics
subject_gerund->tailoring firepower to the intricate needs of warfare
LanguageData.VWE_DesignatedMarksmanRifle.label: marksman rifle
LanguageData.VWE_DesignatedMarksmanRifle.description: Construct semi-automatic marksman rifles, for use in long-distance engagements.
LanguageData.VWE_DesignatedMarksmanRifle.generalRules: subject_story->bridged the gap between sniper precision and rifle agility
subject_story->developed stabilization systems for unmatched accuracy on the move
subject_story->adapted rifles for various environments, from urban to wilderness
subject_gerund->shaping the future of engagement with marksman rifles
LanguageData.VWE_TacticalGrenades.label: tactical grenades
LanguageData.VWE_TacticalGrenades.description: Craft specialized grenades, useful in a variety of engagements.
LanguageData.VWE_TacticalGrenades.generalRules.rulesS: subject_story->expanded the arsenal with grenades for every combat situation
subject_story->innovated with non-lethal options for crowd control and deterrence
subject_story->enhanced fuse mechanisms for precise timing and effect
subject_story->customized payloads for specific tactical needs
subject_gerund->arming troops with the right tools for any engagement
LanguageData.VWE_LaserTargetingSystems.label: laser targeting systems
LanguageData.VWE_LaserTargetingSystems.description: Adapt laser targeting systems for accurate and swift delivery of charged warheads.
LanguageData.VWE_LaserTargetingSystems.generalRules.r: subject_story->revolutionized precision strikes with advanced laser guidance
subject_story->enabled real-time target acquisition and adjustment
subject_story->integrated systems with existing weaponry for enhanced combat effectiveness
subject_story->developed compact, portable laser designators for field operations
subject_gerund->honing the edge of warfare with technology
